resources.string: If checked, a notification will remain in the task bar reminding you of what Defense Condition you are in.
By default this application has a persistent notification of your current Defense Condition. To change this, go to the Settings.
Instability has taken over and remained. All operations halted or destroyed. Everything is lost. SAVE WHAT YOU CAN AND GET OUT.
Instability has taken over. All operations halted in order to re-establishe stability. Everything is on the line. STOP EVERYTHING AND RESTORE STABILITY.
Instability is present and has the capability of taking over at any moment. Operations are still underway but are at great risk. REMAIN VIGILANT.
Instability is present but supressed. At risk operations are halted. Not too much can go wrong. REMAIN ALERT.
Stability is present. There is no instability in sight. All operations continue as usual. Remain ALERT

DEFCON is an application for keeping a Defense Condition on your life. There is little use for this app, except to keep a running tabs on the condition of your projects and operations. Long press each Defense Condition for more information about it.
You must reselect the Defense Condition in order for the changes to apply.
Saves the log text file to root of your SD Card. Warning: overwrites old log.
Enter a location to save your DEFCON log.
